title: How to Change Your Epic Account on a PS4

steps.title: Go to https://www.fortnite.com/.
steps.content: Go to https://www.fortnite.com/ . You can use the browser on your computer, phone, tablet, or console to link your accounts.

steps.title: Select Log in.
steps.content: Select Log in . You should see this at the top right corner of the web browser.

steps.title: Select your username.
steps.content: Select your username. You can either tap it if you're using the mobile browser or hover your cursor over your profile name and picture from your desktop or console browser. A menu should drop-down.

steps.title: Select Account.
steps.content: Select Account . This will redirect you to your account page.

steps.title: Select Connected Accounts.
steps.content: Select Connected Accounts . You'll see this in the menu on the left side of the page.

steps.title: Select Connect under PlayStation Network.
steps.content: Select Connect under PlayStation Network. A box will pop up for you to sign in with your PSN information.

steps.title: Log in with your PSN information (if prompted).
steps.content: Log in with your PSN information (if prompted). If you're using a browser on your PS4, you might not need to do this. If the login is successful, the button under your PSN ID will turn gray and say "Disconnect." [1] X Research source
